title: Project Vendors
problem: Needed to evaluate three AIS data vendors to select a reliable data source.
impact: Built a multi-vendor ingestion pipeline and comparison workflow to support a data-driven vendor decision.

title: Project XMLData
problem: Large XML datasets needed to be normalized and loaded for analytics.
impact: Automated conversion and upload of aggregated data into AWS DynamoDB to enable downstream analysis.

title: Ship Agency Portal
problem: Agency operations relied on manual email triage at high volume.
impact: Built a system to streamline agency workflows handling 160+ emails/hour.

title: myIPSW
problem: Finding official Apple firmware downloads was fragmented and manual.
impact: Built a site using the ipsw.me API to surface firmware downloads quickly.
